name: Mary
description: Well the thing is that, i was born in England. I lived there with my mother and father happily when my father was given a contract to Ghana here. So when he came to Ghana he died in a car accident so his family members was fighting with us over the property my father left for us and my mother did not want any long talking so she decided to run with me to Ghana here to see my father died body and bury him. So i am now in Ghana with my mother and do you have any problem with me living in Ghana here ..?
